bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a sluggish tongue movement impairing one’s speech. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shu jiao 蜀 椒 quotes Jiu ji fang 救急方; Ji jiu liang fang 急救良方 : 舌蹇語吃：川椒，以生麵包丸。每服十粒，醋湯送下 , “For tongue sluggishness and stuttering: Prepare pills from chuan jiao with a coating of unprocessed flour. Each time ingest 10 pills. To be ingested with vinegar decoction”.
